{{Description|"Dancing requires not only grace, but physical endurance as well. That is why Nilou pays particular attention to her dietary intake."|2=[[Dainsleif]] in [https://youtu.be/h7WnRJTVReI Collected Miscellany - "Nilou: Lotus Waves"]}}
'''White Jade Lotus''' is [[Nilou]]'s [[Utility Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* If this talent activates while Nilou cooks [[Padisarah Pudding]], it is possible to double the amount of her special dish, [[Swirling Steps]].
{{Talents by Category List|Perfect Adventurer's Dish Cooking Talents|header=identical|nottitle=White Jade Lotus}}
